SELECT * FROM ostschweiz
WHERE ST_WITHIN(
 ST_Transform(the_geom, 4326),
 ST_SetSRID(
 ST_GeomFromGeoJSON('{ "type": "Polygon", "coordinates": [ [ [ 8.405914306640623, 47.5686504766426 ], [ 8.49517822265625, 47.636246278753234 ], [ 8.5528564453125, 47.63717164223885 ], [ 8.5858154296875, 47.61588413576999 ], [ 8.594741821289062, 47.65706299337806 ], [ 8.58856201171875, 47.69543650537897 ], [ 8.633880615234375, 47.70421683390384 ], [ 8.677825927734373, 47.68480570814145 ], [ 8.703231811523438, 47.65151268066222 ], [ 8.771896362304688, 47.6603004033596 ], [ 8.787002563476562, 47.677871412038485 ], [ 8.841934204101562, 47.65197522925437 ], [ 8.8275146484375, 47.607088939995585 ], [ 8.912658691406248, 47.51951934150781 ], [ 8.942184448242188, 47.411826340096454 ], [ 8.994369506835938, 47.32299967378833 ], [ 8.9373779296875, 47.242881146090085 ], [ 8.859100341796873, 47.22936083555714 ], [ 8.754730224609375, 47.20044377215564 ], [ 8.714218139648438, 47.14536450313261 ], [ 8.644180297851562, 47.155637851831415 ], [ 8.589935302734375, 47.186912636007655 ], [ 8.546676635742188, 47.21117290969667 ], [ 8.446426391601562, 47.20650833393471 ], [ 8.398361206054688, 47.23728695323144 ], [ 8.381881713867188, 47.29413372501023 ], [ 8.427200317382812, 47.31974140450974 ], [ 8.395614624023438, 47.34487142066085 ], [ 8.372268676757812, 47.39091206104779 ], [ 8.3441162109375, 47.40346162477753 ], [ 8.336563110351562, 47.512563103108036 ], [ 8.405914306640623, 47.5686504766426 ] ] ] }'), 4326
)
)
